short_summary: Building 18 Cold Room at AAFC- St-Johns Research and Development Centre, NL
description: Construction services for St-John’s Research and Development Centre. The contract includes repairing a vehicle ramp for access to the top level of building 18. The contractor must remove the existing concrete and asphalt surface, place structural fill, and construct a surface consisting of both concrete and asphalt. Site grading and landscaping to match existing conditions must be done. The contractor must also account for any construction methods required to complete during winter months. The expected completion date is end of December 2023.
full_summary:
**Building 18 Cold Room Construction Tender**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-9373-47431094
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-10T14:00:00

**Project Background:**
Agriculture and Agri-food Canada (AAFC) is soliciting proposals for the construction of a cold room at Building 18, St-Johns Research and Development Centre, Newfoundland and Labrador. The scope of work includes the repair of the vehicle ramp, removal of the existing concrete and asphalt surface, and the construction of a new surface consisting of concrete and asphalt.

**Tender Requirements:**
A two-phase selection process will be used for this project. Phase One is non-competitive, and Phase Two is competitive. Bidders may visit the site during Phase Two, but attendance is optional. The successful bidder will be required to complete the work by December 31, 2023.

**Tender Documents:**
The tender documents can be found on the Canada Buys website, and interested bidders must submit their proposals by the closing date and time specified. All inquiries and information requests must be directed to the AAFC Contract Officer, Carol Rahal, in writing.

**Contract Information:**
* Contracting Entity: Agriculture and Agri-food Canada
* Contracting Officer: Carol Rahal
* Address: 2001 Robert-Bourassa Avenue, Montreal, QC H3A 3N2
* Phone: (514) 231-3209
* Email: carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
The project is located in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, and the work will be performed in Canada.

**Regions of Delivery:**
The project will be delivered in Canada.

**Procurement Method:**
The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of work includes:

* Repairing the vehicle ramp
* Removing the existing concrete and asphalt surface
* Constructing a new surface consisting of concrete and asphalt
* Site grading and landscaping to match the existing conditions

**Timeline:**
The project is expected to start on October 30, 2023, and is expected to be completed by December 31, 2023.
